ctu_text: \n\n"}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Offline", "url": "", "process": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Fresh Application:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The selection of beneficiaries under the 'Credit Card Scheme for Artisans & Weavers in the Handicrafts and Handloom sector' shall be made by a District-level Selection Committee headed by the General Manager, District Industries Centre. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Renewal Application:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The credit limit could normally be valid for a period of five years subject to annual review by the bank. For the purpose of the annual review, the borrower may not be required to submit any financial statement. Based on an assessment of performance during an inspection by field staff and operations in the account, the review exercise may be carried out annually and a decision on continuation or otherwise of the limit sanctioned, below the cap of \u20b9 1,80,000 may be taken.
